values.value:
• Beginning 5/1/2019, contractors may register for 1, 2 or 3 fiscal years. A fiscal year begins on 7/1 and ends on 6/30. Additionally, online applications require online payments by debit card or credit card. The effective date of the registration will be as of the successful payment submission date.
• Payments by business check must be submitted by mail with the paper application form (pdf) and will be effective as of the check clearance date which may be a week or more.
• Note: Phase II will include requirement to submit payroll reports which must be submitted electronically so all contractors will have a login at that time.
